title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 143 - Control of the Box Tree Moth
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 143 - Control of the Box Tree Moth

State Regulations
§ 143.1 - Definitions
§ 143.2 - Establishment of the quarantine area
§ 143.3 - Movement of regulated articles within the quarantine area
§ 143.4 - Pre-notification requirement for shipments of regulated articles into the State of New York
§ 143.5 - Intrastate movement of regulated articles originating within or traveling through the quarantine area to or from points outside the quarantine area
§ 143.6 - Conditions governing compliance agreements for movement of regulated articles out of the quarantine area
§ 143.7 - Conditions governing limited permits and certificates of inspection for movement of regulated articles out of the quarantine area
§ 143.8 - Exemptions
§ 143.9 - Assembly of Regulated Articles for Inspection
§ 143.10 - Marking requirements
§ 143.11 - Inspection and disposition of shipments
§ 143.12 - Other laws and regulations; interstate movement of regulated articles
§ 143.13 - Effective Date

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 143

Adopted

New

York State Register May 25, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 21, eff. 5/25/2022

Statutory Authority: Agriculture and Markets Law §§18, 164
and 167

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
